itemDisplayName: Single instance Windows Server 2012 R2 with 32 data disks configured for storage pools and striped to a single max size volume
description: This template creates a D14 with 32 data disks attached.  Using DSC they are automatically striped per best practices to get maximum IOPS and formatted into a single volume.
summary: Create a VM from 32 Data Disks configured for high IOPS
